title: Heap Data Structure
subject: Data Structures
learning_objectives: Complete Binary Tree representation in Array
theory:
A complete binary tree where parent is always >= children (Max Heap). Implemented using Arrays.
- Parent(i) -> `(i-1)/2`
- Left(i) -> `2*i + 1`
- Right(i) -> `2*i + 2`.

interview_questions.question: Difference between Heap and BST?
interview_questions.answer: Heap guarantees Parent > Children (Order). BST guarantees Left < Parent < Right (Sorting). Heap search is O(n), BST is O(log n).
